explanation: [0-0] In the corner of a football field, a robot stands with stands, fences, some blue chairs, trees and other greenery in the background.

[0-5] First, a white football comes in from the right, the robot takes a step forward, presses its right knee down, pinning the ball to the grass. The words "Robot (a robot symbol) 9/10 (a dart hitting the bullseye symbol)" appear at the top of the screen. The robot walks out to the left, the screen switches, and the caption at the top changes to white text on a black background "Ben." A man in a pink tracksuit and red football boots stands in front of the corner area. A white football comes in from the right, the man in the pink tracksuit traps it with both feet, pushes it forward with his right foot, and the football stops in the corner area. The caption below reads, "8.5/10 (a sweating emoji)."
